title: Zoe's Gift
description: Zo 's Gift Jory Strong A book in the Fallon Mates series. One look at the human female who is his match and the mating fever of the Vesti ignites in Miciah, making it impossible for him to deny what he wants. To go to Earth and claim her, he must choose an Amato co-mate. For him there is only one choice, the bisexual Iden. It'll mean breaking the cultural taboos of the Vesti, but for Zo, he and Iden will become lovers. Miciah intends to keep his sexual relationship with Iden a secret as they take Zo together. Iden has other ideas. What neither of them can know is they've starred in Zo 's dreams for a week, so when they show up in her reality, she welcomes the chance to explore their fantasies-and her own. Miciah and Iden may have come to Earth to claim a mate, but taking her home with them will change Belizair forever.
author: Jory Strong
